title: Co-op Fundamentals for Architects
description: This course will explore aspects of career development related to preparing for and being successful in co-op work terms, such as understanding Co-operative and Experiential Education policies and procedures, using Waterloo Works, preparing résumés, interviewing effectively, meeting employers' expectations, and preparing work-term reports.
requirementsDescription: Prereq: PDARCH 1; Level at least 2A Architecture students
